original_text: Moreover, the word of the Lord came through the prophet Jehu son of Hanani to Baasha and his house, because of all the evil he had done in the eyes of the Lord, arousing his anger by the things he did, becoming like the house of Jeroboam—and also because he destroyed it.
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이 하나니의 아들 선지자 예후에게도 임하사 바아사와 그의 집을 꾸짖으심은 그가 여로보암의 집과 같이 여호와 보시기에 모든 악을 행하며 그의 손의 행위로 여호와를 노엽게 하였음이며 또 그의 집을 쳤음이더라

sentences.original_text: Moreover, the word of the Lord came
through the prophet Jehu son of Hanani
because of all the evil he had done
in the eyes of the Lord,
becoming like the house of Jeroboam—
and also because he destroyed it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 또한 그가 그것을 멸망시켰기 때문이다
